level.heading: DOCUMENTATION OF CONTINUING EDUCATION CREDITS (ยง 17-2311)

level.text: Continuing education course documentation shall be filed on a form provided by the Board and shall include the following:
Title and/or description of course content;

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 40 DCR 8480 (December 10, 1993); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 5846 (July 21, 2006).
